frontmatter.title: Mattermost Operator
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for Mattermost Operator
frontmatter.howItWorks: Connect Mattermost with any of your favorite cloud native apps in just a few clicks. Design, build, and automate anything for your work by integrating apps like Mattermost to create visual automated workflows. Choose from thousands of ready-made apps or use our no-code toolkit to connect to apps not yet in our library.
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Configuring your own Mattermost environment See the Mattermost documentation - https://docs.mattermost.com.
featureList: Drag-n-drop cloud native infrastructure designer to configure, model, and deploy your workloads.
Invite anyone to review and make changes to your private designs.
Ongoing synchronization of Kubernetes configuration and changes across any number of clusters.
